title: (x) "Imagine your possibilities" delicate italic serif - Linotype Didot {Lari}
content:
Hi Everyone - Anyone know the name of this little number?

Thanks in advance!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cover.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235932/http:/typophile.com/files/cover_1.jpg) | 57.42 KB |

 [‹ Baskerville/Caslon???](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235932/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30187 "Go to previous forum topic") [Woodtype sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235932/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29884 "Go to next forum topic")
author: exarte

comments.content: No Bodoni I have has that kind of ‘w’. So I think this is [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235932/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=LH.120939.0.0).
